Articles.Content: I thought it would be cool to be able to change the values on the kerbalEVA part but I can't find it anywhere? Is it possible to change any EVA config? Thanks!

I think the EVA configuration could just be part of the game's engine, which couldn't be modified without tearing it all apart and loading your computer with useless source code.

I wouldn't try.

That's what I figured :'( From the persistent save file is seemed like it was using the part name kerbalEVA but it does look like it's deep in the code. Thanks for the reply! All I wanted was to rocket around space with my super EVA!!
There is an option in the debug/cheat menu for infinite eva fuel if that's what you want, but no way to power it up so you could take off from Kerbin with just a suit.
